channel.title: Modernity on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Modernity on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 1
item.description: I had been planning to blog more but I haven’t had the motivation to do so, so instead of focusing all my mental energy into a single topic that I just didn’t have so much to talk about or doing a project that really wasn’t as fun as I thought it could be I will be sharing here a few interesting things (and my comments on some of those things) that I have seen on a weekly basis (hopefully).
